persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: ADAMSON#Paul, CRAFT#Dan, HOSKING#Fiona, MALONEY#Elizabeth Rose, SELMER#Charlene, SIMON#Anne-Lise, WILMOTT#James
goals__remit: Forum Europe is the leading EU debate specialist, providing a range of own-initiative and client conferences and events. The company has been operating in Brussels for over 25 years and aims to deliver balanced platforms for debate on key EU issues. The company also operates outside of Europe under the Forum Global brand.
